author: Ross Burden
method: Preheat the oven 200C/400F/Gas 6. Place the feta onto a baking sheet. Drizzle the oil over and sprinkle over the remaining ingredients. Place into the oven to bake for five minutes, or until beginning to colour. Remove from the oven, transfer to a dish and serve.
ingredients: 100g/3Â½oz feta cheese,  1 tbsp olive oil,  1 tsp dried oregano,  freshly ground black pepper,  1 lemon, zest only,  squeeze lemon juice,  1 garlic clove, crushed
